original_text: And the Lord delivered Lachish into the hand of Israel, which took it on the second day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were therein, according to all that he had done to Libnah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 라기스를 이스라엘의 손에 넘겨 주신지라 이튿날에 그 성읍을 점령하고 칼날로 그것과 그 안의 모든 사람을 쳐서 멸하였으니 립나에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: which took it on the second day
and smote it with the edge of the sword
and all the souls that were therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있는 모든 영혼들을 죽였으니

sentences.original_text: according to all that he had done to Libnah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 립나에게 행한 모든 것과 같이 하였더라
